member.summary: Gets or sets position of the bookmark within the text line. 0 corresponds to the first character in a line, 1 to the second character, and so on.

member.summary: Gets or sets an integer value that specifies ordinal number of the bookmark.
member.remarks: Edit can display bookmarks that that have Index between 0 and 9, or unnumbered bookmarks (with Index equal to Int.MaxValue).

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMark.Position
member.summary: Gets position of the bookmark within the text (index of character and line). Corresponds to Pos and Line properties.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BookMarkList class with default settings.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarkList.FindByLine(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the first bookmark in the specified line and returns its ordinal number within a BookMarkList collection.
member.param: The integer value specifying index of the text line where to locate bookmark.
member.returns: The boormark ordinal number within a BookMarkList collection.
member.remarks: If the specified line does not contain any bookmark, the method return -1.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarkList.FindByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the bookmark with specified index and returns its ordinal number.
member.param: The integer value specifying Index property of the bookmark.
member.returns: The boormark ordinal number within a BookMarkList collection.
member.remarks: If the bookmark with specified index is not found, the method returns -1.

member.summary: Provides indexed access to the bookmarks in the bookmarks collection.
member.param: Specifies index of bookmark within the collection.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks
member.summary: Represents a collection of the BookMark objects with extended possibilities.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks.#ctor(Stimulsoft.Editor.ITextSource)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BookMarks class with specified owner.
member.param: Class implementing ITextSource interface that owns the collection.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks.Assign(Stimulsoft.Editor.IBookMarks)
member.summary: Copies the contents of the another BookMarks collection to the bookmark collection.
member.param: Specifies bookmark collection to copy content from. Call Assign to replace contents of one IBookMarks instance to another. The Assign method deletes all items from the destination collection then adds a copy of each item in the source bookmark collection.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks.GetBookMark(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the first bookmark in the BookMarks collection located within the specified text line.
member.param: The integer value that specifies index of the text line where to find bookmark.
member.returns: Bookmark index if the bookmarks was found; otherwise -1.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks.GetBookMark(System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Finds the first bookmark in the BookMarks collection that locates within the specified range.
member.param: The Point value that specifies start position to find.
The Point value that specifies end position to to find.
member.returns: Bookmark index if the bookmarks was found; otherwise -1.
member.remarks: The X-coordinates of the startPoint and endPoint structures represents the position within the text line. The Y-coordinates represents the index of the text line.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Editor.BookMarks.GetBookMarks(System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Point,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Finds all bookmarks in the BookMarks collection located within the specified range.
member.param: The Point value that specifies start position to find.
The Point value that specifies end position to find.
Represents the collection of the bookmarks located within the specified range.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions
member.summary: Defines undo/redo behaviour. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions.AllowUndo
member.summary: Allows undo/redo operations.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions.GroupUndo
member.summary: Specifies that last editing command should be undone together with any subsequent editing commands of the same type.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions.UndoNavigations
member.summary: Specifies that navigate operations can be undone.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions.UndoAfterSave
member.summary: Allows undo operation after a save.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOptions.SingleBreakUndo
member.summary: Specifies whether single break and unbreak operation should be undone rather than subsequent operations.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoFlags.None
member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoFlags.FirstTime

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoFlags.Saved
member.summary: Indicates that undoable operation occured prior to saving editor's content

member.summary: Specifies operation that deletes some text.

member.summary: Specifies operation that breaks text line into two lines.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOperation.UnBreak

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOperation.InsertBlock
member.summary: Specifies operation that inserts some block of text.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOperation.DeleteBlock
member.summary: Specifies operation that deletes some block of text.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOperation.Navigate
member.summary: Specifies operation that navigates within text content.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.UndoOperation.NavigateEx
member.summary: Specifies operation that navigates within text content. (this operation is always undone, regardless of UndoOptions);

member.summary: Specifies that subsequent undo operations will be undone at once.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope

member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.summary: Specifies that member to search is a static (belongs to the type itself rather than to a specific object).

member.summary: Specifies that member is instance (belongs to the object).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Global
member.summary: Specifies that member is global (belongs to the global module).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Protected
member.summary: Specifies that member may be protected.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.TypeName
member.summary: Specifies that member should display type name in code completion window.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Delegate
member.summary: Specifies that member should display event handler code completion window.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Method

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Property
member.summary: Specifies that member represents Reflection PropertyInfo.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Field
member.summary: Specifies that member represents Reflection FieldInfo.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.ShortType

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Editor.StaticScope.Private
member.summary: Specifies that member may be private.
